summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal sewerage utility; authorizing the construction of relief sewers in 6th Avenue West from a connection with the existing sewer in West Bertona Street to a connection with the North Trunk Sewer in West Ewing Street, and in certain other streets and avenues, as contemplated by plan and system Ordinance No. 84391; and making an appropriation from the Sewer Fund therefor.
